title: GET_RESOURCE_KVP_STRING
content:
0x5240DA5A// GetResourceKvpString
char* GET_RESOURCE_KVP_STRING(char* key);Parameters:key: The key to fetchReturns: The string value stored under the specified key, or nil/null if not found.A getter for SET_RESOURCE_KVP.Examples:Lualocal kvpValue = GetResourceKvpString('codfish') 
if kvpValue then
	-- do something!
end
codeBlocks:
local kvpValue = GetResourceKvpString('codfish') 
if kvpValue then
	-- do something!
end
